Julie Vos: Hey, this is Rebecca, your personal concierge âœ¨ Feel free to text me with any questions! Use code WELCOMEK8V2 for 10% off your order to shop now: julievos.attn.tv/a2dCjIg0lvcr .

Julie Vos: Oh, also, a lot of people like getting personal recs from us. Over the next few days we'll try to help you find something that you will love.

In the meantime, check out our newest arrivals > https://julievos.attn.tv/atcUbCw5YkqP .

Julie Vos: Thank you for your purchase! We know you'll love your new jewelry - visit our site to discover hundreds more luxuries in our signature 24K gold: https://julievos.attn.tv/aIt-i-qHjN24
Julie Vos: Thank you for your purchase! Your order number is 683934. View more information about your order here: https://julievos.attn.tv/agHuB3HGdXhu .

Julie Vos: Shiny. Chic. Polished to perfection. 

New silver jewels await you. Shop now: julievos.attn.tv/aj3tcLWyI7jN.

(attn) Hey, I need help with something:  i just signed up to earn reward points am buying the cannes link necklace in silver alongwith the link bracelet. Have a question- i have just ordered in the last 5 days -the cannes neckace in gold , the bracelet in gold , the door knocker earrings , the I believe catalina earrings. - i think you can look up my previous orders.  Can I include these also to earn reward points pls?

Julie Vos: Thank you for your purchase! That's a good question. Yes! You earn points with every purchase from JulieVos.com. You may redeem your points for a future order using the instructions below.

1. Visit our Rewards Page:
Visit https://julievos.attn.tv/aHvwLr6cV_tt
2. Log In or Join:
Once you're on the Rewards page, click the Get Started button, then select Login.
If you already have a Julie Vos account, please log in. If not, click Create account to set up a new account.
3. Scroll to "Redeem Rewards":
Once you're signed in, scroll down the page until you see the Redeem Rewards section. This is where you'll see how many points you have and how much they're worth.
Here's a screenshot to help you spot it easily: https://julievos.attn.tv/ajegdjxGHCcO

(This image should show the Redeem Rewards section with the slider and redeem button visible.)

4. Choose How Many Points to Use:
Use the slider to pick how many points you'd like to redeem. You'll see how much money you'll save based on your selection.
5. Click "Redeem":
After choosing your points, click the Redeem button. This will generate a unique discount code just for you.
6. Use the Code at Checkout:
At checkout, paste your code into the box that says "Discount code or gift card", then click Apply.
Helpful Tip:
If you ever lose track of your code, no worries! Just go back to the Redeemed tab in the Redeem Rewards section to view it again.
Points expire 12 months after they are earned, but don't worry - we'll send you a reminder ahead of time so you'll have the chance to use them before they expire.

If you run into any trouble at all, don't hesitate to reach back out, we're always happy to help!
Can u pls confirm u git this?
Julie Vos: Could you clarify what you're referring to? I would be happy to help.
I am about to purchase 2 more items and signing up to earn reward points. And - I have already purchased over $1,500 worth of items in the last 3/4 days can I include these to earn points as well?
Do you need my information so you can look up my orders and see what my items are? They have not arrived yet. They are confirmed and are being shipped.
Julie Vos: We appreciate the purchase and the support! Let me check this with the team for you. Yes, can I please have your email address?

send_to_cs: Shipping inquiries on a current order
For product or general inquiries you can't find the answer to, use PGI shortcut
escalate: No escalations for this client, send everything to CS
tone: Don't use the word "unfortunately" to discuss our appointment structure
Don't use the word "best" to reference a product (e.g., best ring, etc.)
templates: If cx are looking for an engagement ring and don't provide specifics, use LER shortcut
dos_and_donts: If the customer responds incorrectly to the journey, don't send jny temp, recommend items based on their selection instead
Cx can create their own engagement ring on the webiste by choosing a setting, stone and size
Cx can customize rings by working with designers who will use their ideas, drawings, images to create the ring they want
Don't disclose the locations of their labs/production facilities
drive_to_purchase: **Be MORE SALESY, if the customer is showing intent to purchase then:**
**âžœ Ask open-ended general questions such as style & material**
âžœ After asking open-ended questions, transition to specific questions such as center stone, etc.
âžœ If the customer liked our recommendation, push for the sale by asking about payment options or when they hope to have the item
promo_and_exclusions: Please see here for current offer details: https://www.brilliantearth.com/promo-codes-and-offers/

escalation_preferences: For questions regarding order, service, shipping questions on a current order, post-purchase will go to cssupport@brilliantearth.com
For product or general inquiry questions, please contact info@brilliantearth.com
